headline: Revvity Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., July 24, 2025--The Board of Directors of Revvity (NYSE: RVTY), today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on November 7, 2025 to all shareholders of record at the close of business on October 17, 2025.

headline: Revvity Q2 Preview: Can Strong Segments Deliver an Earnings Beat?
summary: RVTY is likely to see another earnings beat as Diagnostics momentum and Signals Software growth offset tariff headwinds.
